robustaÂ¶

robusta is an open-source statistical analysis package in Python. It uses rpy2 as a backend. robusta features most of the common statistical tests such as:

  • t-tests and ANOVAs

  • correlation coefficients

  • regression and mixed modeling

Most tests include both parametric and non-parametric versions. Also, most tests include both Frequentist and Bayesian versions.

For a full list see API

robusta is designed with two main use cases in mind

  1. Interactive sessions (teaching, data exploration).

  2. Pipelining (producing periodic reports, generating publication ready textual reports).

  • API Reference
